channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-19498] Vectorization: CAST expressions produce wrong results
item.description:
Wrong results for:

DATE --> BOOLEAN
DOUBLE --> DECIMAL
STRING|CHAR|VARCHAR --> DECIMAL
TIMESTAMP --> LONG
item.summary: Vectorization: CAST expressions produce wrong results

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12924696 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build
Committed patch #5 to master and branch-3.  teddy.choi thank you for your code review!

mmccline, committing to master without a clean QA is not allowed anymore. You can see vote thread over here:
http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/hive-dev/201805.mbox/%3C75DCEC8A-9C05-46F4-B39D-63C201FD20DB%40apache.org%3E

I have reverted the patch. Please resubmit the patch to get a clean QA run before pushing it.
